item.description: Prevent your phone from pocket typing.
Your language, your way. First and only third-party touchscreen keyboard.
Keep track of the time spent on your device and find out what a phone addict you are!
Browse your entire file system, way beyond File Manager.
Active Frame to hire by third-party headless apps.
Get reliable battery data for your extended battery.
Simple game demonstrating Cascades Animation demo.
Alarm running headless that will ring both your phone and your Pebble.
Get CallerId on your Pebble (10.3 and up).
Personalize your homescreen by creating invisible icons.
Developers : Get console logs on-the-go, even on release builds.
Change your phone's Notification profile right from your Pebble.
